resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106641</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106641</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206904</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Woodrow Wilson: Prophet of Peace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Woodrow Wilson: Prophet des Friedens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Woodrow Wilson : Prophète de paix</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Woodrow Wilson: Prophet da paz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Woodrow Wilson: Prophet di pace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Woodrow Wilson: Προφήτης της ειρήνης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Woodrow Wilson: Profeta de la paz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">examines President Wilson's struggle and ultimate failure to reach the ideal of achieving lasting world peace through the League of Nations. Through various activities students can learn about the conflict between Wilson's ideals of world peace and the Senate's policy of isolationism.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überprüft Präsident Wilsons Kampf und 
entscheidende Störung, das ideale des Erzielens des dauerhaften 
Weltfriedens durch die Liga von Nationen zu erreichen. Durch 
verschiedene Aktivitäten können Kursteilnehmer über die 
$überschneidung zwischen Idealen Wilsons des Weltfriedens und der 
Politik des Senats des Isolationismus erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">examine la lutte du Président Wilson et le manque
final d'accéder l'idéal de réaliser la paix durable du monde par la
ligue des nations. Par de diverses activités les étudiants 
peuvent se renseigner sur le conflit entre les idéaux de Wilson de la
paix du monde et la politique du sénat de l'isolationnisme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">examina o esforço do presidente Wilson e a falha 
final alcançar o ideal de conseguir paz durável do mundo através da
liga das nações. Com as várias atividades os estudantes podem
aprender sobre o conflito entre ideals de Wilson da paz do mundo e a 
política do senate do isolationism.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esamina la lotta del presidente Wilson e l'ultima 
omissione raggiungere il ideale di realizzare la pace durevole del 
mondo attraverso la lega delle nazioni. Con le varie attività 
gli allievi possono imparare circa il conflitto fra gli ideali del 
Wilson di pace del mondo e la politica del senato del isolationism.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει την προσπάθεια Προέδρου Wilson's και την 
τελευταία αποτυχία να επιτευχθεί το ιδανικό της επίτευξης της 
μόνιμης παγκόσμιας ειρήνης μέσω της ένωσης των εθνών. 
Μέσω των διάφορων δραστηριοτήτων οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να 
μάθουν για τη σύγκρουση μεταξύ των ιδανικών Wilson της 
παγκόσμιας ειρήνης και της πολιτικής της Συγκλήτου του 
απομονωτισμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">examina lucha de presidente Wilson y último 
incidente de alcanzar el ideal de alcanzar paz duradera del mundo a 
través de la liga de naciones. Con varias actividades los 
estudiantes pueden aprender sobre el conflicto entre los ideales de 
Wilson de la paz del mundo y la política del senado del aislacionismo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206904</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106641</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/woodrow-wilson-prophet-of-peace</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
